title: LeagueClient wonÂ´t open
body: I started LoL yesterday anything works and now i want to start lol and the LOL LOGO comes for 2 seconds and close then

replies.body: The patcher not launching can happen if your settings have changed and blocking it.  You'll want to go over each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore access and make sure League is added as an exception.
i have the same issue, but i heard it is under maintanance
